name: PECKHAM DIE: MONSTER HUNTER (DEMO)
description:
This game follows the story of a rookie monster hunter in Peckham South London.

It was my first venture into TWINE and using choose your own adventure books and D&D campaigns as my inspiration.

It is set in a world I created for a pen and paper role playing campaign that I created for my friends.

Hope you enjoy this unfinished but cute game.

Please let me know if you notice any bugs or glitches. Reach me on: Freddelanka@gmail.com
